title: Help downloading installer pls
body: hi everyone im having problems with lol. all was working fine yesterday then i went to login in today and it wouldnt even open, it just said my internet isnt working so i unistalled the program and tried to reinstall it from scratch. now its saying webpage is unavailable because the dns cant be found?? help meehh please.

replies.body:
Are you on Mac or Windows? Who's your ISP?

Have you tried [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4)? That is a fixed that a lot of people have reported to have worked for them, when they couldn't access the installer download webpage.
